H0.text: Helium is the element that all living things contain.

H1.text: Sodium is the element that all living things contain.

H2.text: Copper is an element that all living things contain.

H3.text: Carbon is the element found in all living things.

A4.text: Carbon occurs in all known organic life and is the basis of organic chemistry.

A5.text: It is the second most abundant element in the human body by mass (about 18.5%) after oxygen.
